Title: Of Gods and the Undead
Writer: Ruy Guerra, Flávio Império, Paulo José
Actors: Norma Bengell, Othon Bastos, Ítala Nandi, Nelson Xavier
Plot: In the 1930's, in the South of State of Bahia, Brazil, an adventurer with no name or history, who had already been shot 7 times, gets involved in the battle for land and cacao plantations. ...
